definitions.definition: ( cooking ) A vessel for boiling a liquid or cooking food, usually metal and equipped with a lid .
examples: To cook pasta, you first need to put the kettle on.
There's a hot kettle of soup on the stove.

definitions.definition: The quantity held by a kettle.
A vessel or appliance used to boil water for the preparation of hot beverages and other foodstuffs.
examples: Stick the kettle on and we'll have a nice cup of tea.

definitions.definition: ( geology ) A kettle hole , sometimes any pothole .
( ornithology , collective ) A group of raptors riding a thermal , especially when migrating .
( rail transport , slang ) A steam locomotive
An instance of kettling ; a group of protesters or rioters confined in a limited area.
A bucket for holding a quantity of paint during the painting process.

definitions.definition: Alternative form of kiddle ( “ kind of fishweir ” ) .
